archimate:WorkPackage.name: S&C Capability Development Project
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation:
S&C Capability Development Project This is the main project driving the development of various Capabilities required by Security & Compliance. Currently our Capabilities are realized by various overlapping solutions and applications. Our current capabilities are also missing some key functions, like in-country operations. Projects under these are all aiming to optimize and develop future state portfolio for Security & Compliance which meets our stakeholders requirements. Resources
Program Manager looking after the whole exercise Enterprise architect making sure our projects are delivering what we need
